images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, depicting warm beaches and lush landscapes.
AI-selected These images will showcase specific attractions in Thailand, highlighting beaches, markets, and spa experiences, aligning with the adventurous tone of the campaign.
AI-selected These images will showcase specific attractions in Thailand, highlighting beaches, markets, and spa experiences, aligning with the adventurous tone of the campaign.
AI-selected These images will showcase specific attractions in Thailand, highlighting beaches, markets, and spa experiences, aligning with the adventurous tone of the campaign.
AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and promotions related to travel to Thailand during the autumn season.

AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and trust in the promotional campaign.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting warm beaches, clear skies, and lush landscapes of Thailand during autumn
highlighting beautiful beaches, rice fields, and local markets

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя Тайланд осенью — рай на земле!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, depicting warm beaches and lush landscapes.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
